basics.name: Ilya Maksimenko
basics.label: Full Stack Software Developer
basics.summary: Multifunctional software engineer with years of experience in commercial development. Sequence of successfully implemented projects from trading platform, to e-publishing services, e-commercial integrations, and others.

projects.name: Prototyping Application and Sharing Service
projects.description: Prototyping Application is UX tool that gives UX professionals the power to build realistic, functional prototypes. Sharing service allows to host, share, inspect, and gather feedback on UX prototypes.
projects.summary: Prototyping Application is UX tool that gives UX professionals the power to build realistic, functional prototypes. Sharing service allows to host, share, inspect, and gather feedback on UX prototypes.
highlights: Implemented own UI kit of web components.
Implemented API endpoints for new features.
Implemented search and commenting features.
Improved performance of database operations and SQL scripts.
Implemented Microsoft Teams and Slack integrations.
Integrated SAML authentication.
Implemented zooming and panning for prototype application.
Implemented Redis caching.
Led development for scope of new features.
Performed R&D and Implemented POC.

projects.name: Shopify integration for Order Management System
projects.description: Two-way integration platform for manage goods and receive orders
projects.summary: Two-way integration platform for manage goods and receive orders
highlights: Implemented architecture for two-way integration with e-commerce platform.
Realized Jenkins deployment for development server.
Implemented service features.

projects.name: Order Management System
projects.description: Portal for managing orders based on a given workflow of various types of products. Changing statuses as well as creating various workflows is possible using the web interface.
projects.summary: Portal for managing orders based on a given workflow of various types of products. Changing statuses as well as creating various workflows is possible using the web interface.
highlights: Implemented client application architecture.
Implemented client application functionality.
Refactored service API to support new data structure.

projects.name: Cloud E-publishing Platform
projects.description: E-publishing platform delivers digitally-enriched print to web. The data preparation service for the platform is used to check/edit the data received from the publication text recognition system.
projects.summary: E-publishing platform delivers digitally-enriched print to web. The data preparation service for the platform is used to check/edit the data received from the publication text recognition system.
highlights: Implemented feature for selecting text blocks on canvas.
Refactored project and Implemented features according GDPR.
Implemented Docker containerization.
Refactored js libs to monorepo.
Performed R&D and Implemented POC.

projects.name: Sales Forecasting System
projects.description: A sales forecasting tool designed for business planning and analyzing a company's performance. Application have ability to add, view, sort, find and display data in different views.
projects.summary: A sales forecasting tool designed for business planning and analyzing a company's performance. Application have ability to add, view, sort, find and display data in different views.
highlights: Refactored service API to support new data structure.
Implemented new functionality for client app.
Integrated typescript models generation from C# code.

projects.name: Trading Platform Application
projects.description: Complete solution to trading stocks, crypto, futures and ETFs at real-market spot prices of global and crypto exchanges free of any fees.
projects.summary: Complete solution to trading stocks, crypto, futures and ETFs at real-market spot prices of global and crypto exchanges free of any fees.
highlights: Implemented integration with SMS and Email providers.
Implemented business logic and data access layer.
Implemented service API with documentation.
Implemented caching and unit tests.
Implemented client app with administrative tools.
